    • Constructor Detail

      • SquareView

        public SquareView(int x,
                  int y,
                  RoomColor color,
                  boolean spawn,
                  java.util.Map<CardinalPoint,java.lang.Boolean> map)
        Class constructor, it builds a square view to show the arena
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate of the square
        y - coordinate of the square
        color - of the room where the square is placed
        spawn - true if the square is a spawn point, else false
        map - with cardinal points and true if the direction is accessible from the square, else false

      • SquareView

        public SquareView(int x,
                  int y,
                  RoomColor color,
                  boolean spawn,
                  java.util.List<GameCharacter> activePlayers,
                  AmmoTile availableAmmoTile,
                  java.util.List<Weapon> store,
                  java.util.Map<CardinalPoint,java.lang.Boolean> map)
        Class constructor, it builds a square view when the game is resumed after a save
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate of the square
        y - coordinate of the square
        color - of the room where the square is placed
        spawn - true if the square is a spawn point, else false
        activePlayers - List of the active game characters on the square
        availableAmmoTile - Ammo tile on the square
        store - List of the weapon on the store
        map - with cardinal points and true if the direction is accessible from the square, else false
